name: Seed Head Brooch
description:
A eyecatching handmade brooch made with three different colour fair trade wool felt balls with beading and embroidery to create the look of flower seed heads. Each brooch features three green leaves growing out from beneath the seed heads. The brooch is fixed with a silver plated brooch pin which has been securely sewn onto the back.

The brights brooch comes in turquoise, fuchsia and yellow and the jewels brooch is in aubergine, red and green. Only one jewel colour left in stock.

Perfect to add a pop of colour to your wardrobe, looks fantastic on your coat lapel or pinned onto you favourite bag, scarf or hat.

Measures 7cm/2.75" at widest point. Choose from either the brights or jewels.

Comes in a brown card box, perfect to give as a gift.

name: Avenue Lavender Pillow
description:
Ever so sweet handmade lavender pillows made with 100% cotton featuring hand printed cotton and felt patch on the front with a cute coordinating button. Filled with french chemical free highly scented lavender and polyester soft stuffing.

Perfect for popping in your clothing drawers to help keep your clothes fresh and free of those pesky moths, or even on your bedside table to naturally scent your room and help get a relaxing nights sleep.

Please choose your colour from pink, turquoise or black. Note that this colour choice is the colour of the house print fabric and not that of the felt and button.

Approx size - 10cm/4" by 10cm/4"

name: Polka Dot And Floral Rosette Brooch
description:
Sweet rosette brooch made with pleated polka dot cotton with a hand covered floral button centre. Ofset with a contrasting groisgrain ribbon detail

Available in red spot with pale blue button or black dot with oatmeal button.

Measures approx 5.5 cms / 2.25" not including ribbon.

Comes on a polka dot backing card and wrapped in acid free tissue paper tied with coloured string. Perfect for sending as a gift.

name: Gingham And Daisy Rosette Brooch
description:
Sweet rosette brooch made with pleated gingham fabric with a hand covered daisy fabric button centre. Ofset with a contrasting double sided satin ribbon detail.

Choice from red and navy or black and red.

Measures approx 5.5 cms / 2.25" not including ribbon.

Comes on a polka dot backing card and wrapped in acid free tissue paper tied with coloured string. Perfect for sending as a gift.

name: Felt rose brooch
description:
Classic felt rose brooch designed by laurafallulah.

Made in coloured felt with handstitched petal detail and two green leaves. Secured with a silver plated brooch back. This is a great modern twist on a classic, perfect for vintage fashion lovers. 

Measures 5cms excluding leaves.
